definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: prob. go about, from one to another (for trade or gossip) (? connected with [[רגל]]; cf. Ar. rakala kick a horse, to make him go [? prop. use the foot, cf. 0rjl ?]; NH [[רוֹכֵל]], Aram. [[רוֹכְלָא]], rakolo0 trader, NH [[רְכִילוּת]] slander [cf. ma04in calumniator, fr. ma4ay go about, Qor 2:19 al.]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[רוֹכֵל]] Ct So 3:6; fs. cstr. [[רׂכֶ֫לֶת]] Ez Eze 27:3, sf. [[רׂכַלְתֵח]] v:Eze 27:20, v:Eze 27:23; mpl. [[רׂכְלִים]] 1Ki 10:15 + , etc.;—as subst. = trafficker, trader: usu. pl., Na 3:16, Ez Eze 17:4 (´[[עִיר ר]]:), Eze 27:13, Eze 27:15, Eze 27:17, Eze 27:22, Eze 27:22, Eze 27:23 a (< del. Toy Krae), v:Eze 27:24, Ne 3:31, Ne 3:32, Ne 13:20 ( + [[מׂרֵי כָל־מִמְכָּר]]); ´[[מִסְחַר הָר]]: 1Ki 10:15 (text dub.; cf. ´[[מ]]: p.695); sg. fig. of Tyre, [[רׂכֶלֶת הָעַמִּים אֶל־אִיִּים רַכִּים]] Ez Eze 27:8, of a people v:Eze 27:20, v:Eze 27:23 b (pl. Mez:Ḥarran 34 Krae, v. also [[כִּלְמֶד]]); sg. of pers. only [[אַבְקַת רוֹכֵל]] Ct So 3:6.
